item.description:
GenerationDesi is back with one of its most popular parties of the year 2011
"DHOL DHAMAKA 2011" - back by popular demand - for one night only!
We have a treat for you Friday, January 28th, 2011 on the occasion of India Republic Day!!

Party with a live Dholi AMIT & your favorate Bhangra, Bollywood, Top40 beats mixed in with Boston's Best DJ BUNTY in the house for more night!

@Our newest location, the recently renovated and upscale Congas Lounge in Harvard Square in Cambridge. Pleanty of offstreet parking around and parking lot right across. On the red line T stop for Harvard Square.

Tickets at www.GenerationDesi.com.

Note from the host, for those who came to Congas last time..the party was very very happening and fun!! Lets make it even more fun this time...:)
item.name: Dhol Dhamaka 2011(Harvard Square)
